venue.name: Paycom Center
venue.address: 100 W Reno Ave, Oklahoma City, OK 73102

Courtside.Description: Direct court access for an immersive game experience, with interactions and close-up action.
Courtside.View_Quality: Direct view at court level, engaging fans directly in the game's intensity.
Courtside.Unique_Features: Chance for close encounters with players and media visibility.
Courtside.Accessibility: Immediate court access, including accommodation for mobility devices.
Courtside.Special_Perks: Exclusive club access, complimentary upscale dining, and other VIP benefits.

Lower_Bowl.Description: Great views near the court, blending proximity with a comprehensive view.
Lower_Bowl.View_Quality: Clear, unobstructed views of the court, capturing the game's essence.
Lower_Bowl.Unique_Features: Comfortable seating and extra space, avoiding the dense crowds.
Lower_Bowl.Accessibility: Convenient entry, with elevator and escalator access to the seating area.
Lower_Bowl.Special_Perks: Access to premium lounges and in-seat service for an enhanced experience.

Upper_Bowl.Description: Economical seating with a comprehensive view, ideal for vibrant fans wanting to enjoy the game's atmosphere.
Upper_Bowl.View_Quality: Panoramic view of the court, perfect for witnessing the game's flow.
Upper_Bowl.Unique_Features: An affordable option to enjoy Thunder games.
Upper_Bowl.Accessibility: Easy seating access, with nearby concessions and facilities.
Upper_Bowl.Special_Perks: A cost-effective choice for fans to experience the excitement of the game.

Skybox_and_Suites.Description: An exclusive and private viewing experience with top-notch amenities.
Skybox_and_Suites.View_Quality: Elevated and secluded viewing with luxurious seating comfort.
Skybox_and_Suites.Unique_Features: Dedicated service, exclusive entrances, and gourmet dining.
Skybox_and_Suites.Accessibility: VIP access leading directly to suite levels.
Skybox_and_Suites.Special_Perks: Private gatherings, custom catering, and access to exclusive areas and services.

restaurants_bars.name: Flint
restaurants_bars.address: 15 N Robinson Ave, Oklahoma City, OK 73102
restaurants_bars.description: Casual eatery in the Colcord Hotel offering American cuisine with a modern twist, ideal for pre-game dining.

restaurants_bars.name: The Jones Assembly
restaurants_bars.address: 901 W Sheridan Ave, Oklahoma City, OK 73106
restaurants_bars.description: A vibrant venue featuring a restaurant, bar, and concert space, known for its eclectic American fare and lively atmosphere.

restaurants_bars.name: Bricktown Brewery
restaurants_bars.address: 1 N Oklahoma Ave, Oklahoma City, OK 73104
restaurants_bars.description: Pioneering local brewery and restaurant in the Bricktown entertainment district, offering a selection of craft beers and hearty meals.

restaurants_bars.name: Mickey Mantle's Steakhouse
restaurants_bars.address: 7 Mickey Mantle Dr, Oklahoma City, OK 73104
restaurants_bars.description: Upscale steakhouse located in Bricktown, famous for its prime steaks and extensive wine list, perfect for a luxurious pre-game meal.

restaurants_bars.name: Tapwerks Ale House & Caf√©
restaurants_bars.address: 121 E Sheridan Ave, Oklahoma City, OK 73104
restaurants_bars.description: Oklahoma's oldest tap house, offering an extensive selection of draft beers and traditional pub fare in a cozy setting.

restaurants_bars.name: Fuzzy's Taco Shop
restaurants_bars.address: 208 Johnny Bench Dr, Oklahoma City, OK 73104
restaurants_bars.description: Laid-back chain offering Mexican fare, including signature Baja tacos and a variety of beers, close to the action.

accommodations.name: The Skirvin Hilton Oklahoma City
accommodations.description: Historic hotel offering upscale accommodations with elegant dining and easy access to Paycom Center.

accommodations.name: Colcord Hotel
accommodations.address: 15 N Robinson Ave, Oklahoma City, OK 73102
accommodations.description: Luxury boutique hotel with modern amenities, located just minutes from Paycom Center.

accommodations.name: Aloft Oklahoma City Downtown - Bricktown
accommodations.address: 209 N Walnut Ave, Oklahoma City, OK 73104
accommodations.description: Trendy hotel with loft-style rooms and a vibrant social scene, located close to Paycom Center.

accommodations.name: AC Hotel by Marriott Oklahoma City Bricktown
accommodations.address: 411 E Sheridan Ave, Oklahoma City, OK 73104
accommodations.description: Stylish hotel offering comfortable rooms with a European flair, conveniently located near Paycom Center.

tourist_attractions.name: Oklahoma City National Memorial & Museum
tourist_attractions.address: 620 N Harvey Ave, Oklahoma City, OK 73102
tourist_attractions.description: A memorial and museum dedicated to the victims, survivors, and rescuers of the Oklahoma City bombing on April 19, 1995.

tourist_attractions.name: Bricktown
tourist_attractions.description: A lively entertainment district known for its restaurants, bars, and canal-side attractions, including a water taxi tour.

tourist_attractions.name: Myriad Botanical Gardens
tourist_attractions.address: 301 W Reno Ave, Oklahoma City, OK 73102
tourist_attractions.description: A 17-acre botanical garden and interactive urban park featuring walking paths, a dog park, and the Crystal Bridge Tropical Conservatory.

tourist_attractions.name: Oklahoma City Museum of Art
tourist_attractions.description: Home to a diverse collection of artworks, including one of the world's largest collections of Chihuly glass.

tourist_attractions.name: The Wheeler Ferris Wheel
tourist_attractions.address: 1701 S Western Ave, Oklahoma City, OK 73109
tourist_attractions.description: An iconic Ferris wheel offering breathtaking views of the Oklahoma River and downtown Oklahoma City.

team_related_activities.name: Paycom Center Behind-the-Scenes Tour
team_related_activities.address: 100 W Reno Ave, Oklahoma City, OK 73102
team_related_activities.description: Explore the home of the Oklahoma City Thunder with an exclusive tour that includes access to private suites, the press box, and team locker rooms.

team_related_activities.name: Thunder Fan Experience
team_related_activities.address: 100 W Reno Ave, Oklahoma City, OK 73102
team_related_activities.description: Engage in unique fan experiences with opportunities to meet Thunder players and legends, participate in autograph sessions, and attend special team events.

options.description: The EMBARK bus service provides routes that connect various parts of the city with downtown Oklahoma City, including stops near the Paycom Center.
The Oklahoma City Streetcar has stops within walking distance to the Paycom Center, offering a convenient way to reach the arena from other parts of downtown.

best_places_to_buy.name: Official Team Website
best_places_to_buy.description: The primary source for all ticket sales, offering guaranteed authenticity for Thunder games.

best_places_to_buy.name: Ticketmaster
best_places_to_buy.description: Authorized ticketing partner for the Oklahoma City Thunder, providing a secure platform for purchasing authentic tickets.

best_places_to_buy.name: StubHub
best_places_to_buy.description: A trusted secondary marketplace for Thunder tickets, offering buyer protections and verified tickets.

ticket_purchasing_tips.ways_to_save: To save on tickets, consider attending non-prime games against less popular teams. Early season and weekday games often have lower prices. Signing up for the Thunder's official newsletter can also provide access to exclusive discounts and promotions.
ticket_purchasing_tips.avoiding_scalpers: Always use official team websites, authorized partners, or reputable secondary marketplaces for ticket purchases. This ensures ticket authenticity and avoids the risks associated with scalpers and fraudulent tickets.
